dublin_core.dcvalue: In a telemedical consultation medical information is sought at a distance Two techniques may be used asynchronous store and forward and synchronous realtime Asynchronous consultations have the advantage that the two parties do not have to be available simultaneously email for example has been used successfully for teledermatology Synchronous consultations depend on communication media such as the telephone radio or videoconferencing Successful videoconferencing will involve consideration of four factors the environment session initiation dialogue and session closure The environment is very important for good quality consultations and involves planning equipment and training Recognizing the advantages and limitations of the available media combined with appropriate planning and training will maximize the utilization of teleconsultations
How to do a telemedical consultation.
